
{{{ci
include:
  - remote: https://gitlab.com/repo/dir/-/raw/version/jobs.yml

stages:
  - test
  - deploy
  - apply

test:
  stage: test
  extends: [.gj_earthly]
  script:
    - earthly --no-output +test
  only:
    - branches
  except:
    - production

}}}



- extends: Inherits this job (could be keept in a seperate file and imported)
    - e.g.: `gj_earthly` is keept in a different repo in the `jobs.yml` which is imported at the top
- only/except: https://docs.gitlab.com/ee/ci/yaml/#only--except


Basic Syntax: https://docs.gitlab.com/ee/ci/yaml/
